query.sql:
SELECT c.card_id from card c inner join attribute_value vLink on (vLink.card_id = c.card_id) inner join card cLink on (cLink.card_id = vLink.number_value) inner join attribute_value vUser on (vUser.card_id = cLink.card_id) inner join attribute_value vUrg on (vUrg.card_id = cLink.card_id) left join attribute_value vFlag on (vFlag.card_id = cLink.card_id and vFlag.attribute_code = 'ADMIN_1082454') where c.status_id in (101,102,103) and vLink.attribute_code in ('JBR_INFORM_LIST', 'JBR_IMPL_ACQUAINT' ) and cLink.status_id in (102,67424,67425) and vUser.attribute_code in ('JBR_RASSM_PERSON','JBR_FOR_INFORMATION') and vUser.number_value = %CURRENTUSER% and vUrg.attribute_code = 'JBR_HOWFAST' and vUrg.value_id = 1912 and coalesce(vFlag.string_value, '2') <> '1' and (c.template_id = 764 or cLink.status_id <> 67425)
union
select crd.cID from ( select avMain.number_value cID, cr.status_id
from card cp inner join attribute_value vr on (vr.number_value = cp.card_id) inner join card cr on (cr.card_id = vr.card_id) inner join attribute_value ve on (ve.card_id = cr.card_id) inner join attribute_value vUrg on (vUrg.card_id = cr.card_id) INNER JOIN attribute_value avMain ON (avMain.card_id = cp.card_id) left join attribute_value va on (va.card_id = cr.card_id and va.attribute_code in ('JBR_RPT_ARMFLAG','JBR_RPT_ARMFLAG2') ) where cp.template_id = 324 and cp.status_id = 103 and vr.attribute_code in ('ADMIN_702311') and cr.template_id in (1044) and cr.status_id IN (702239,556656,102) and ve.attribute_code in ('ADMIN_702335') and ve.number_value = %CURRENTUSER% and vUrg.attribute_code = 'JBR_HOWFAST' and vUrg.value_id = 1912 AND avMain.attribute_code = 'JBR_MAINDOC' and coalesce(va.string_value, '2') <> '1'
UNION
select avMain.number_value cID, cr.status_id
from card cp inner join attribute_value vr on (vr.card_id = cp.card_id) inner join card cr on (cr.card_id = vr.number_value) inner join attribute_value ve on (ve.card_id = cr.card_id) inner join attribute_value vUrg on (vUrg.card_id = cr.card_id) INNER JOIN attribute_value avMain ON (avMain.card_id = cp.card_id) left join attribute_value va on (va.card_id = cr.card_id and va.attribute_code in ('JBR_RPT_ARMFLAG','JBR_RPT_ARMFLAG2') ) where cp.template_id = 324 and cp.status_id = 103 and vr.attribute_code in ('ADMIN_713517') and cr.template_id in (1144) and cr.status_id IN (67424) and ve.attribute_code in ('ADMIN_726874') and ve.number_value = %CURRENTUSER% and vUrg.attribute_code = 'JBR_HOWFAST' and vUrg.value_id = 1912 AND avMain.attribute_code = 'JBR_MAINDOC' and coalesce(va.string_value, '2') <> '1' ) crd inner join card c on c.card_id = crd.cID where c.template_id = 764 or crd.status_id <> 67425
union
SELECT c.card_id from card c inner join attribute_value vLink on (vLink.card_id = c.card_id) inner join card cLink on (cLink.card_id = vLink.number_value) inner join attribute_value vUser on (vUser.card_id = cLink.card_id) inner join attribute_value vUrg on (vUrg.card_id = cLink.card_id) where c.status_id in (107,108) and vLink.attribute_code in ('JBR_VISA_VISA','JBR_SIGN_SIGNING') and cLink.status_id in (107,108) and vUser.attribute_code in ('JBR_VISA_RESPONSIBLE','JBR_SIGN_RESPONSIBLE','JBR_VISA_RESPONSIBLE') and vUser.number_value = %CURRENTUSER% and vUrg.attribute_code = 'JBR_HOWFAST' and vUrg.value_id = 1912
